cwe.Description: The product does not have documentation that represents how it is designed.

Extended_Description.xhtml:p: This issue can make it more difficult to understand and maintain the product. It can make it more difficult and time-consuming to detect and/or fix vulnerabilities.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
